seo.title: Sorrento: Gateway to the Amalfi Coast
seo.description: Why start in Sorrento and how to connect onward to Positano and Capri.

linkLabel: Sorrento: Gateway to the Amalfi Coast
intro: Sorrento is a practical jumping-off point with frequent buses and ferries toward the Amalfi Coast and easy rail links back to Naples and Pompeii.

sections.title: Why arrive via Sorrento
body: Trains from Naples arrive regularly; accommodation is plentiful and often better value than Positano.
From town, buses and seasonal ferries connect you to Positano and Amalfi.

sections.title: Onward connections
body: SITA buses run year-round to Positano and Amalfi; buy tickets before boarding.
